product_name: Sea to Summit Sit-On-Top Kayak Cart
long_description: Use the Sea to Summit Sit-On-Top kayak cart to take the backache out of getting to the water. Simply slide the cart's adjustable crossbar posts into the scupper holes of the kayak, snug down with adjustable strap and you're ready to roll. Rubber cones fit a wide range of scupper holes from 1 - 2 in. in diameter, and specialized design reduces side-to-side motion while pulling kayak. Axle adjusts from approximately 7 - 15.75 in. and locks into place with a heavy-duty, quick-release clamp. Tough alloy tubing resists corrosion, and welded construction ensures durability. Pneumatic rubber wheels roll easily over sand, slightly rocky beaches, uneven terrain and concrete. Includes tie down strap with buckle. The Sea to Summit Sit-On-Top Kayak Cart weighs approximately 7 lbs. 6 oz. and hauls kayaks up to 154 lbs.
short_description: Use the Sea to Summit Sit-On-Top kayak cart to take the backache out of getting to the water.
